directions: Pound or mash the garlic to a paste. Heat the oil in a medium skillet. Add the onion rings and sauté until they are tender and light golden. Add the garlic paste and sauté briefly, then stir in all the other ingredients and serve at once.
ingredients: 1 medium yellow onion (about 8 ounces) cut into 1/4-inch thick rings
Juice of 1 medium bitter orange (about 1/4 cup), lime juice, or distilled white vinegar
Salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
title: Maricel's _Mojo_
